Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that President Donald Trump called Antonio Trillanes IV a "little narco" without sufficient evidence or verification.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as there is no record or transcript of Trump referring to Trillanes as a "little narco" in his press engagements.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the quote attributed to Trump is genuine, even though it originated from a tabloid article with no proof or citation.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that the quote attributed to Trump may be fabricated or misinterpreted, as there is no verifiable evidence of him using such language.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there is no record or proof of Trump referring to Trillanes as a "little narco" in any official statements or press engagements.
